name: Samurai Dash (himar)
description:
Two samurai face in an inhospitable Japanese forest where they will try to cross the adversary with their katana. Who will retain the honor and rise with victory? ABOUT

Samurai Dash is a local multiplayer fighting game whose protagonists are two samurai one blue and one red, runs on a map of Sakura trees, you must defeat the opponent through the katana, helping you from the trees at the ends

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
  • OS: Windows Vista or greater 
  • CPU: 2 Ghz 
  • RAM: 1 GB
  •  GPU: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+ 
  • DirectX: Version 10 
  • Storage: 30 MB of available space
DEVELOPERS: Pablo Hernández Navarro Quiryat Marrero Barreto Himar Suárez Campos
